name: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
name_original: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
description:
See No Evil. Hear No Evil is a stealth, horror, exploration game that has the player navigate an abandoned mansion teeming with ‘uninvited guests’. Players have to sneakily avoid monsters to recover their lost memories and find out the truth behind the voice in their head.

See No Evil, Hear No Evil was developed by Another Anxiety Attack (AAA), a group of passionate student developers from UOWMKDU. The team consists of:

  • Chuan Wei Yin
    • Lead Artist
  • Poon Hui Hua
    • Artist
  • Jason Yong Man Wai
    • Artist
  • Lee Chong Wei
    • Lead Programmer
  • Bill Ng Jia Cheng
    • Programmer
  • Ozaer Gabriel Fitzrol
    • Programmer
  • Chan Jay Sern
    • Lead Designer
